ShowOnlyEnabledRolesInGuesserUI: Zeige nur aktivierte Rollen im Guesserbord an
EngineerTOHEInfo: Nutze die Schächte, um die <color=#ff1919>Verräter</color> zu erwischen
ScientistTOHEInfo: Greife überall auf die tragbare Lebensanzeige zu
ShapeshifterTOHEInfo: Verwandle dich in Besatzungsmitglieder, um den Verdacht auf sie zu werfen
MercenaryInfo: Töte weiter, sonst begehst du Selbstmord
VampiressInfo: Deine Kills sind verzögert und direkt
WarlockInfo: Verhexe Besatzungsmitglieder, dann formwandle dich, um sie andere killen zu lassen
AssassinInfo: Markiere ein Ziel, dann formwandle dich, um es zu töten
AnonymousInfo: Zwinge einen Spieler dazu eine Leiche zu melden
MinerInfo: Kehre zu deinem zuletzt genutztem Schacht zurück, indem du Form wandelst
KillingMachineInfo: Du kannst NUR töten, aber die Wartezeit ist gering
EscapistInfo: Formwandle dich, um Orte zu markieren und zu diesen zurückzukehren
WitchInfo: Verhexe Spieler, damit sie im Treffen sterben
PuppeteerInfo: Bring die andere Spieler dazu für dich zu töten
MastermindInfo: Bring andere dazu für dich zu töten
SniperInfo: Erschieße Spieler, indem du dich distanziert formwandelst
UndertakerInfo: Teleportiere Leichen zu einer markierten Position
RiftMakerInfo: Two rifts I trace, touch 'em to warp space
AntiAdminerInfo: Du weißt, wenn Spieler in der Nähe von Geräten sind
ArroganceInfo: Mit jedem Kill verringerst du deine Killwartezeit
ScavengerInfo: Leichen, die du hinterlässt, sind nicht meldbar
EvilGuesserInfo: Erguesse die Besatzungsrollen in den Notfalltreffen, um sie zu killen
CleanerInfo: Melde Leichen, um sie unmeldbar zu machen
BallLightningInfo: Wandeln Sie Spieler in Quantengeister um
GreedierInfo: Die Wartezeit um zu töten verschiebt sich
ImperiusCurseInfo: Du tauschst Plätze mit dem Spieler, in den du dich verwandelst
QuickShooterInfo: Lagere Munition, um deine Abklingzeiten zu verschieben
HangmanInfo: Ich entscheide wann dein Leben beendet wird
WildlingInfo: Töte mit Stärke und verkleide dich
VindicatorInfo: Nutze deine zusätzlichen Stimmen, um alle zu töten
ParasiteInfo: Helfe den Verrätern die Besatzung zu töten
InhibitorInfo: Du kannst während Sabotagen nicht killen
SaboteurInfo: Du kannst nur während Sabotagen killen
EvilDivinerInfo: Finde die Rolle anderer Spieler heraus
MorphlingInfo: Du kannst nur als Geformwandelter killen
LurkerInfo: Verringere deine Killwartezeit durchs Benutzen des Lüftungsschachtes
ConvictInfo: Dein Ziel ist tot, hilf jetzt den Verrätern
VisionaryInfo: You see the alignments of the living
RefugeeInfo: Hilf den Verrätern die Besatzung zu töten
UnderdogInfo: Start killing on a low player count
GodfatherInfo: Konvertiere Spieler zu Flüchtlingen, indem du sie im Treffen wählst
PitfallInfo: Stelle Fallen auf der Karte auf
BerserkerInfo: Töte, um dein Level zu erhöhen
EvilMiniInfo: Niemand kann dich töten, bis du ausgewachsen bist
CleanserInfo: Lösche alle Add-ons von deinem gewählten Opfer
ParanoiaInfo: Du hast einen tragbaren Notfall-Treffen Knopf
SabotageMasterInfo: Nutze Vents und behebe die Sabotagen
VigilanteInfo: Nicht der Held den wir verdienten, aber den, den wir brauchten
CopyCatInfo: Nutze den Tötungknopf, um die Rolle des Ziels zu kopieren
SnitchInfo: Vollende deine Aufgaben, um die <color=#ff1919>Verräter</color> zu erkennen
MarshallInfo: Fertige deine Aufgaben, um deine Unschuld zu beweisen
DictatorInfo: Wirf einen Spieler aus basierend auf deinem eigenen Urteil
DetectiveInfo: Erhalte zusätzliche Informationen, wenn du Leichen meldest
UndercoverInfo: Verräter sehen dich als einen Partner
NiceGuesserInfo: Erguesse die <color=#ff1919>Verräter</color> -rollen in den Notfalltreffen, um sie zu killen
TransporterInfo: Erledige Aufgaben, um die Positionen von 2 zufälligen Spielern zu tauschen
VeteranInfo: Begebe dich in Bereitschaft, um jeden zu töten, der versucht mit dir zu interagieren
CounterfeiterInfo: Versuche die Spieler zu Narren zu machen
GrenadierInfo: Verringere die Sicht der <color=#ff1919>Verräter</color>, indem du dich in die Vents begibst
MedicInfo: Cast a shield onto a player
DivinatorInfo: Bekomme Hinweise zu den Rollen der Spieler
MonarchInfo: Give your crew extra voting power!
StealthInfo: Killing Blinds Everyone in the Room
BloodhoundInfo: Finde die Leichen und deren Mörder
PresidentInfo: You are in charge of the meeting
DeputyInfo: Nehme Mörder fest, um deren Tötungs-Abklingszeiten zu erhöhen
GuardianInfo: Erledige deine Aufgaben, um unsterblich zu werden
AddictInfo: Begebe dich in Schächte, um unangreifbar zu werden, ansonsten stirbst du
MoleInfo: <size=90%>Verschwinde und wiedererscheine, das Spiel des Maulwurfs ist kristallklar!</size>
AlchemistInfo: Braue Tränke, indem du Aufgaben erledigst
OracleInfo: Wähle einen Spieler, um deren Ausrichtung zu erfassen
SpiritualistInfo: Be guided by the ghostly life
ChameleonInfo: Vent to disguise into your surroundings
InspectorInfo: Validate the alignments of two players
CaptainInfo: Segle mit dem Kapitän, damit die Addons nicht verloren gehen.
AdmirerInfo: Wähle einen Spieler an deiner Seite zu bleiben
ReverieInfo: Mit jeden Tötungen, wird deine Kill-Wartezeit kürzer
LighterInfo: Erwische Killer mit deiner erweiterten Sicht
TaskManagerInfo: Sehe die totalen Aufgaben erledigt, in Echtzeit
WitnessInfo: Finde heraus, ob jemanden vor kurzen getötet hat
ChiefOfPoliceInfo: Rekrutiere Spieler zum <color=#ffb347>Sheriff</color>, indem du sie mit Messern killst
NiceMiniInfo: Keiner kann dich verletzen bis du wächst.
ArsonistInfo: Übergieße alle und entfache das Feuer
HuntsmanInfo: Töte deine Ziele für eine Reduzierung der Abklingzeiten
SpyInfo: Du weißt, wer mit dir interagiert
RandomizerInfo: Wenn du stirbst, wirst du jemandes Last sein?
OpportunistInfo: Bleib am Leben bis zum Ende
InnocentInfo: Zwinge jemanden dich umzubringen, und erreiche dass er gevotet wird
RevolutionistInfo: Rekrutiere Spieler damit sie mit dir gewinnen
KonanInfo: Immer noch bei einem Date mit Xiaoling...
DarkHideInfo: Verschwinde in die Dunkelheit, verbreite Angst!
WorkaholicInfo: Beende alle deine Aufgaben, dann gewinnst du alleine!
BloodKnightInfo: Morde geben dir ein temporäres Schild
SidekickInfo: Hilf dem Schakal, jeden zu töten
TotocalcioInfo: Folge einem Spieler und hilf ihnen
SerialKillerInfo: Schalte alle aus, um zu gewinnen!
JuggernautInfo: Mit jedem Mord verringert sich deine Abklingzeit
PursuerInfo: Schütze dich selber und bleib am Leben bis zu Ende!
PhantomInfo: Werde getötet und erledige deine Aufgaben um zu gewinnen!
PirateInfo: Lass Spieler über die Planke gehen um zu gewinnen
MaverickInfo: Töte und überlebe bis zu Ende
CursedSoulInfo: Schnapp Seelen und stehle den Sieg
VultureInfo: Esse Leichen, indem du sie meldest, um zu gewinnen
MedusaInfo: Versteinere Leichen, indem du sie meldest
BakerInfo: Erledige deine Aufgaben, um dein Brot zu vergiften
SpiritcallerInfo: Wandle Spieler in böse Geister um
AmnesiacInfo: Erinnere die Rolle von einer Leiche
ImitatorInfo: Mache eine Rolle eines Spielers nach
MasochistInfo: Werde ein paar Mal angegriffen, um zu gewinnen!
KamikazeInfo: Töte Spieler mit einer selbstmörderischen Mission
DoomsayerInfo: Errate/Guesse die Rollen von Spielern, um zu gewinnen
ShroudInfo: Spieler einhüllen, um sie zu töten
ShamanInfo: Reflektiere alle Attacken auf eine Voodoo-Puppe
PixieInfo: Markiere sie, pack' sie in einen Sack, schmeiß sie raus!
SoulCollectorInfo: Sage Morde voraus um Seelen zu sammeln
SchrodingersCatInfo: Die Katze ist sowohl lebendig als auch tot, bis sie beobachtet wird.
RomanticInfo: Beschütze deinen Partner, um zusammen zu gewinnen
VengefulRomanticInfo: Räche deinen Partner, um zusammen zu gewinnen
RuthlessRomanticInfo: Töte jeden, um mit deinem Partner zu gewinnen
HexMasterInfo: Verhexe Spieler, damit sie in Treffen sterben
WraithInfo: Begebe dich in Schächte, um kurz unsichtbar zu werden
PotionMasterInfo: Nutze deine Tränke zu deinem Vorteil
NecromancerInfo: Töte deinen Mörder, um deinen Tod zu widerstehen
NtrInfo: Jeder sieht dich als seinen Liebhaber
WatcherInfo: Du siehst alle Spielerfarben von den Votes
SeerInfo: Du wirst alarmiert, wenn jemanden stirbt
BewilderInfo: Eine Verdrehung der Sicht, ein Netz aus Verwirrung
WorkhorseInfo: Sei der Erste, der seine Aufgaben erledigt, um mehr zu erhalten
AvangerInfo: Du ziehst jemanden mit in deinen Tod
YoutuberInfo: Werd zuerst getötet um zu gewinnen
SchizophrenicInfo: Du bist Tod und am Leben, zugleich
MimicInfo: Enthülle die Rollen der getöteten Spieler zu Verrätern, wenn du stirbst
GuesserInfo: Erguesse die Rollen in den Notfalltreffen, um sie zu killen
ReachInfo: Du hast eine Erhöhung der Tötungsreichweite
BaitInfo: Dein Killer meldet deine Leiche sofort
TrapperInfo: Mache deinen Killer für ein paar Sekunden bewegungsunfähig
ReboundInfo: Errate mich, und ich ersteche dich!
UnreportableInfo: Deine Leiche kann nicht gemeldet werden
RogueInfo: Arbeite gegen dein Team und gewinne mit deinesgleichen
RascalInfo: Du siehst in manchen Fällen feindlich aus
GravestoneInfo: Deine Rolle ist bekannt, wenn du stirbst
AutopsyInfo: Du kannst sehen wie die andere gestorben sind
AdmiredInfo: Der Bewunderer wählt dich als Partner
DiseasedInfo: Erhöhe die Abklingzeit der Spieler die mit dir interagieren
AntidoteInfo: Verringere die Abklingzeit der Spieler die mit dir interagieren
SwiftInfo: Deine Kills bewirken keine große Auswirkung
UnluckyInfo: Aktionen können dazu führen, dass du stirbst
AwareInfo: Erfahre, wer deine Rolle bekannt gegeben hat
FragileInfo: Stirb sofort, wenn jemand mit dir interagiert
GhoulInfo: Töte deinen Mörder nach deinem Tod
BloodlustInfo: Lasse deiner Blutlust freien Lauf und töte
ClumsyInfo: Es kann sein, dass du dein Opfer verfehlst
NimbleInfo: Du kannst dich in Schächte begeben!
CircumventInfo: Du kannst nicht mehr in den Schacht
HurriedInfo: Gott ich habe zu viele Sachen!
StatueInfo: Du bist immer noch wie ein Fels in der Brandung
BardInfo: Die Schönheit eines Gedichts, des Mörders Pfad im Gesicht. Ein rhythmischer Tanz, in dunkler Eleganz.
RainbowInfo: Colorful melodies! You don't even know your own color.
EngineerTOHEInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Ingenieur hast du die Fähigkeit, Vents zu nutzen, solange die Kommunikation nicht sabotiert ist.
ScientistTOHEInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Wissenschaftler hast du die Fähigkeit, die Lebensanzeige der gesamten Besatzung ortsunabhängig zu nutzen.
ShapeshifterTOHEInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Formwandler kannst du dich temporär in andere Besatzungsmitglieder verwandeln. Es ist erkennbar, wenn du deine Form wechselst oder zurücksetzt.
GuardianAngelTOHEInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Schutzengel bist du meist der erste Tote und kannst temporäre Schilde an lebende Besatzungsmitglieder verteilen.
ImpostorTOHEInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Verräter ist es dein Ziel, die Besatzung zu killen.
Du kannst sabotieren und Vents nutzen.
CrewmateTOHEInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Besatzungsmitglied ist es dein Ziel, die Verräter zu finden und rauszuwerfen.
Die Besatzung kann gewinnen, indem sie die Verräter loswerden, oder alle Aufgaben abschließen.
BountyHunterInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Jedes Mal, wenn du als Kopfgeldjäger dein Ziel tötest (markiert durch einen Pfeil), ist deine Killwartezeit verkürzt.
Wenn du jemand anderen als dein Ziel tötest, ist deine Killwartezeit erhöht. Dein Ziel ändert sich nach einer bestimmten Zeit.
FireworkerInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Feuerwerker kannst du dich formwandeln um Feuerwerkskörper zu platzieren (maximale Anzahl durch den Host festgelegt). Wenn du der letzte Verräter bist und du alle Feuerwerksraketen platziert hast, formwandle wieder, um sie zu zünden. Alle Spieler im Feuerwerksradius sterben, plus dir. Wenn du alle Spieler mit deinen Feuerwerksraketen getötet hast, gewinnen die Verräter.
MercenaryInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Mercenary, you must kill within your Deadline shown by your Shapeshift cooldown (which you cannot use). If you fail to kill, you die.
ShapeMasterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Shapemaster, you have no Shapeshift cooldown.
VampireInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Vampir sind deine Kills verzögert. Wenn ein Treffen einberufen wird, stirbt der gebissene Spieler sofort. Wenn du den Killköder/Bait beißt begehst du Selfmeldung.
VampiressInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Vampirin kannst du Spieler beißen wie ein Vampir (ein Klick) oder normal töten (Doppelklick).
WarlockInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Hexenmeister kannst du einen anderen Spieler verhexen.
Wenn du dich formwandelst killt der Verhexte den nächstegelegenen Spieler, je nach Einstellung bist du und/oder die anderen Verräter davon inbegriffen.
Während du geformwandelt bist, kannst du normal killen.
ZombieInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Zombie has a short kill cooldown, but moves very slowly and has very little vision. Zombie will not be voted out by anyone other than the Dictator, and the movement speed of Zombie will gradually slow down as they make kills or time passes.
AssassinInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Ninja kannst du deinen Killknopf benutzen, um ein Ziel einmal zu markieren. Wenn du dann formwandelst, wirst du zum markierten Ziel teleportiert und killst es. Abhängig von den Einstellungen kannst du nach einem Ninjakill normal töten.
AnonymousInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Anonymous, you can Shapeshift to force your target to report whoever you killed this round.
If you killed nobody that round, the target will report their own dead body as if they had died.
Note: This does not work on Lazy nor Lazy Guy, and this ability will work regardless of whether the body can normally be reported.
MinerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Miner, you can shapeshift to teleport back to the last vent you were in.
KillingMachineInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Killing Machine, you have a very short kill cooldown, but cannot vent, have Crewmate vision, cannot sabotage, cannot report, and cannot call emergency meetings.

Note: You will bypass any and all shield, killing bait and beartrap won't take any effect
EscapistInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Escapist, you can Mark a location by Shapeshifting. Shapeshift again to teleport back to the Marked spot (the Shapeshifting animation will display after you teleport, be careful).
WitchInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Hexe kannst mit dem Killknopf jemanden verhexen (ein Klick) oder normal killen (Doppelklick). Die verhexten Spieler haben im Treffen offen sichtbar ein 「†」 neben dem Namen. Wenn du nach dem Treffen noch lebst, sterben die verhexten Spieler.
NemesisInfoLong:
(Impostors [Ghost]):
As the Nemesis you can revenge some players.
PuppeteerInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Puppenspieler kannst du deinen Killknopf benutzen, um andere Spieler zu Puppen zu machen (ein Klick) oder normal zu töten (Doppelklick).
Die Puppe wird den nächsten nicht-Verräter killen, dem sie begegbet. Je nach Einstellung stirbt die Puppe dann auch oder nicht.
MastermindInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Vordenker kannst du deinen Tötungsknopf benutzen, um Spieler zu manipulieren. Das macht nichts, wenn der manipulierte Spieler keinen Tötungsknopf hat. Wenn jedoch der Spieler einen Tötungsknopf hat, wird ihnen mitgeteilt, dass sie manipuliert wurden und diese müssen dann in einer vorgegebenen Zeit jemanden töten, ansonsten sterben sie. Doppelklick auf jemanden, um sie normal zu töten.
TimeThiefInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Jedes Mal, wenn der Zeitdieb einen Spieler killt, verringert sich die Besprechungszeit um eine gewisse Zeit. Wenn der Zeitdieb stirbt wird die Besprechungszeit wieder zurückgesetzt.
SniperInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Du kannst Spieler aus der Ferne killen.
Du musst deine Form zweimal wandeln um erfolgreich einen Fernschuss abzufeuern.
Denk dir einen Pfeil von der ersten Formwandelposition bis zur Rückformwandelposition.
Das ist die Richtung, in die du schießt.
Der Schuss tötet die erste Person in seiner Bahn.
Du kannst nicht normal töten bis alle deine Kugeln (in Klammer) verbraucht sind.
UndertakerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Everytime you Shapeshift into a player you mark the location. Your kills will then teleport to the marked location.
After every kill and meeting your marked location will reset.

After every teleported kill you will freeze for a configurable amount of time
RiftMakerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As Rift Maker you can shapeshift to create a rift. You can teleport from one rift to another by touching the area where the rift was created. Trying to vent will kick you out and all the rifts will be destroyed.

Note: Up to two rifts can be placed at a time, if you try to place a third, it removes the first one.
EvilTrackerInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Der böse Verfolger kann andere Leute verfolgen und der böse Verfolger kann Formwandeln in sein Formwandelziel (Du wandelst dich direkt zurück nach dem Formwandeln). Der Pfeil unter dem Namen des bösen Verfolgers zeigt in die Richtung seines Ziels. Wenn der Teamkollege des bösen Verfolgers tötet, der böse Verfolger sieht seinen Bildschirm aufblinken als Zeichen das der Kolllege getötet hat.
EvilGuesserInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Der Böse Guesser kann die Rolle von bestimmten Spieler im Notfalltreffen guessen. Wenn der Guessversuch richtig war, stirbt der erratene, wenn er falsch war, stirbt der Böse Guesser.
Der Befehl zum Guessen ist: /bt [Spieler-ID] [Rolle]
Du kannst die Spieler-IDs neben jedem Namen der Spieler sehen, oder benutze den Befehl /id um dir alle Spieler-IDs anzeigen zu lassen.
AntiAdminerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
The Anti Adminer can at any time find out if there are crewmates or neutrals near Cameras, Admin Table, Vitals, DoorLog and/or other devices. Note: Anti Adminer does not know for sure if the player is using the device while near it, they only know that someone is near the device.
ArroganceInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Der Arrogante verringert seine Tötungs-Abklingzeit mit jedem erfolgreichen Mord.
BomberInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Der Bomber kann den Formwandlungs-Knopf benutzen, um zu explodieren, und tötet damit alle Spieler in Reichweite. Aber das hat seinen Preis, der Bomber stirbt auch. Notiz: Alle Spieler werden eine Mord-Animation sehen, wenn der Bomber explodiert.
ScavengerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Scavenger kills do not leave dead bodies behind. In addition, if the victim is a bait, no self-report will be made.
BoobyTrapInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als Fallenleger, deine Hauptmethode zu töten, ist bei Leichen aufdecken. Wenn jemand versucht eine Leiche aufzudecken, die du getötet hast, stirbt er.
CapitalismInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Kapitalisten können eine kurze Aufgabe an einen Spieler vergeben, indem sie den Tötungsknopf benutzen. Notiz: Nutzung der Fähigkeit auf Spieler ohne Aufgaben, oder Spieler, die ihre Aufgaben schon erledigt haben, wird keinen Effekt haben.
GangsterInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Der Gangster kann versuchen, einen Spieler zu Verräterhelfern rekrutieren, indem sie den Tötungsknopf benutzen. Wenn die Rekrutierung ein Erfolg war, wird eine Schildanimation auf dem Gangster und dem Ziel gezeigt (welche nur diese beiden sehen). Die verbleibende Zahl an Rekrutierungen wird neben dem Namen des Gangsters gezeigt (maximale Zahl vom Gastgeber festgelegt). Wenn der Gangster jemanden zu rekrutieren versucht, der nicht rekrutiert werden kann (wie z. B. Neutrale), wird der Gangster sie töten. Wenn der Gangster seine Rekrutierungs-Ladungen verbraucht hat, tötet er normal.
CleanerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Cleaner can press the Report button to clean up any dead body they come across (including those they kill). If the cleanup is successful, the Cleaner will see a shield animation on their body as a reminder (only visible to himself). The cleaned up body cannot be reported (including bait's).
BallLightningInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Blitz kannst du nicht normal töten. Stattdessen, kannst du den Tötungsknopf benutzen, um das Ziel zu quantisieren. Diese werden nach einer bestimmten Verzögerung den nächsten Spieler töten, mit dem sie in Kontakt kommen. Alle aktuell quantisierten Spieler haben ein「■」neben ihren Namen. Zusätzlich werden alle quantisierten Spieler sterben, wenn sie ein Treffen am Ende überleben. Es gibt auch eine Einstellung die deinen Mörder automatisch quantisiert.
GreedierInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Gierig's Tötungs-Abklingszeiten sind unterschiedlich, je nach gerade oder ungeraden Tötungen. Die Abklingzeit ist nach jedem Treffen zurückgesetzt, und der erste Mord nach einem Treffen zählt immer als ungerade.
CursedWolfInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Wenn der verfluchte Wolf kurz davor ist, getötet zu werden, wird er den zukünftigen Mörder verfluchen.
(Die maximale Zahl an Kontern ist vom Host festgelegt)
ImperiusCurseInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Seelenfänger kannst du formwandeln, um die Plätze mit deinem Ziel zu tauschen, solange sie am Leben, in Schächten vom Pelikan gegessen, oder in zuständen dergleichen sind.
QuickShooterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When the kill cooldown is over, Quick Shooter can reset the kill cooldown by shapeshift to store a bullet (when the storage is successful, a shield-animation visible only to himself will appear on their body as a reminder). If Quick Shooter has bullets he can use one to bypass kill cooldown, he will kill even if it's still on cooldown, and use a bullet. At the beginning of each meeting, the quick shooter can only keep a certain number of bullets (Number is set by the host).
CamouflagerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When Camouflager uses Shapeshift, all players start to look exactly the same. This state ends when Camouflager reverts its shape-shifting. Note: the skills of communication sabotage camouflage and skills of Camouflager can be superimposed.
Skill will be invalid if a meeting is held during the skill activation of the Camouflager
EraserInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Eraser can vote for any crew target at the meeting to erase the target's roles, and the erasure will take effect after the meeting ends. Note: Players whose skills are erased will always be considered a vanilla role, including the game result page.
A player can only be erased once(include Oiiai)
OverKillerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Butcher kills (including passive kills) have multiple dead bodies on targets, making it impossible to accurately identify other dead body when reporting. Note: Due to the principle of implementation, the killed target has to repeatedly display the animation of being killed. This animation cannot be skipped and cannot participate in the meeting normally during this period. In addition, if the Butcher kills the Avenger, the Avenger will revenge everyone in anger.
HangmanInfoLong:
(Impostors):
The killing method of the Hangman during the shapeshifting is strangling. Strangling ignores any status of the target, such as the shield of the Medic, the protection of the Bodyguard, the skills of the Super Star, etc. The strangled player will not leave a dead body, nor will it trigger any of its skills. For example, Veteran kill back (including additional roles), in addition, Seer will not be prompted.
SwooperInfoLong:
(Verräter):
Als der Swooper kannst du dich in Schächte begeben, um temporäre Unsichtbarkeit zu erlangen. Du wirst auf deinem Bildschirm sichtbar erscheinen. Begebe dich ein zweites Mal in Schächte, um Sichtbar zu werden.
CrewpostorInfoLong:
(Team Verräter):
Du mordest den nächsten Spieler jedes Mal, wenn du eine Aufgabe erledigst.
WildlingInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Wildling, you can shapeshift but lack the ability to vent.
When you kill, you temporarily become immune to attacks.
TricksterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Trickster, you function as a regular Impostor but with one key difference.
You appear crewmate to crewmate roles.

The Sheriff cannot kill you.
Psychic does not see you as evil.
Snitch cannot find you.
VindicatorInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Vindicator, you have extra votes like a Mayor.
StealthInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When the Stealth kills, players in the same room are blinded for a short time.
PenguinInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Penguin, you can restrain target by pressing the kill button, and drag around.
While dragging, the target dies by pressing the kill button again or after a certain period of time.
Press the kill button twice for a direct kill.
ParasiteInfoLong:
(Team Impostor):
As the Parasite, you are an Impostor that does not know the other Impostors.

You may kill, vent, sabotage, whatever.
Just know that you are an Impostor.
DisperserInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Disperser can use Shapeshift to teleport all players to random vents.
Note: the Disperser itself will not be teleported with shapeshift and players who are in the vent cannot be teleported.
InhibitorInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Inhibitor, you can only kill when there is not a critical sabotage active.

If a critical sabotage is active (eg Lights or Reactor), you cannot kill.
SaboteurInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Saboteur, you can only kill when there is a critical sabotage active.

If a critical sabotage is active (eg Comms or O2), then you can kill.
CouncillorInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Councillor, you can kill players during a meeting like a Judge.
When killing in a meeting, those kills will appear as a trial from a Judge.

The kill command is /tl [player id]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
DazzlerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Dazzler, you can reduce the vision of the target of your Shapeshift permanently. When you die, their vision will turn back to normal.
DeathpactInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Deathpact, the targets of your shapeshifting are marked for a deathpact.
If enough players are marked for a death pact, the marked players must meet within a defined period of time; if they fail to do so, they die.
If a marked player dies before the death pact is completed, the pact is withdrawn.
DevourerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Devourer, you use your shapeshift to permanently change the appearance of the target of the shapeshift. Additionally, for each player's appearance changed, your kill cooldown is reduced by a defined number of seconds. If the Devourer dies or gets voted out during a meeting, the player's appearance will change back to their normal appearance.
MorphlingInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Morphling, you are a Shapeshifter but cannot kill while not shapeshift.
TwisterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Twister, you can use shape-shifting to randomly swap the position of all players. The swap happens twice, once when you start your shape shift and once when you return to your original appearance.
The Twister itself will not swap places with anyone and players who are in vents cannot be teleported.
LurkerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Lurker, you can jump into a vent to reduce your cooldown by a certain number of seconds. After you kill, your cooldown is reset to its original value.
ConvictInfoLong:
(Madmates):
As the Convict, you originally were an Executioner or Lawyer.
Your target had been killed and now you work for the Impostors.
VisionaryInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Visionary, you see the alignments of living players during a meeting.
The following info will be displayed on the player.:
- The Red name indicates the Impostors.
- The Cyan name indicates the Crewmates.
- The Gray name indicates the Neutrals.
PlagueDoctorInfoLong:
(Neutral):
(Seuchendoktor von TOH)
Als Seuchendoktor musst du jeden lebenden Spieler infiziert bekommen.
Du startest mit einem beliebigen Spieler, den du infizierst, wenn wer für kurze Zeit in unmittelbarer Nähe dieses Infizierten verbringt, wird er selbst auch infiziert.
Der Infizierungsprozess ist kumulative, also er resetet sich nicht nach Distanzierung oder nach Treffen.
RefugeeInfoLong:
(Madmates):
As the Refugee, you were either an Amnesiac who remembered an Impostor, or a killer who killed the Godfather's target.

Now your job is to help the Impostors kill the crewmates.
UnderdogInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Underdog, you cannot kill until there's a certain amount of players alive.
EvilDivinerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Consigliere, you can reveal the roles of other players using your kill button.

Single click: Reveal role
Double click: Kill

If you run out of reveal uses, your kill button functions normally.
LudopathInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Ludopath, your kill cooldown is randomized.

Minimum it can be is 1 second, while the maximum is your default kill cooldown.
GodfatherInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Godfather, you vote someone to make them your target.
In the next round if someone kills the target, the killer will turn into a Refugee.
ChronomancerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Chronomancer, you can charge up your kill button. Once activated the Chronomancer can use their kill button infinitely until they run out of charge.
PitfallInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Pitfall, you use your shapeshift to mark the area around the shapeshift as a trap. Players who enter this area will be immobilized for a short period of time and their vision will be affected.
BerserkerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Berserker, you level up with each kill.
Upon reaching a certain level defined by the host, you unlock a new power.

Scavenged kills make your kills disappear.
Bombed kills make your kills explode.
EvilMiniInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As an Evil Mini, you are unkillable until you grow up and have a very long initial kill cooldown, which is drastically shortened as you grow up.
BlackmailerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Blackmailer, when you shift into a target you will blackmail that player, and the blackmailed player cannot speak.

Speaking by the blackmailed player will trigger the confusion command, please do not speak when the blackmailed player sees his icon
InstigatorInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Instigator, it's your job to turn the crewmates against each other. Each time a Crewmate is voted out in a meeting, as long as you are alive, an additional Crewmate who voted for the innocent player will die after the meeting. The number of additional players dying is determined by the host.
NeedyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Lazy Guy has only one task In addition, Impostor's abilities can't affect the Lazy Guy, such as being a scapegoat for the Anonymous, marked by a Warlock or Puppeteer, and more. Lazy Guy will not have any add-ons.
SuperStarInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
There will be a star logo next to the Super Star's name, so everyone knows who the Super Star is. The Super Star can only be killed when the Murderer is alone with the Super Star (regular kills only). In addition, the Super Star cannot be guessed by Guessers.
CyberStarInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
All Crewmates see the kill-flash when the Celebrity dies (same as the Seer sees the kill-flash) and get a notice at the next meeting. The Impostors don't know anything about this.
CleanserInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Cleanser can vote for any target at the meeting to erase the target's Add-ons, and the erasure will take effect after the meeting ends. Depending on the settings cleansed player may never get add on in future
KeeperInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As keeper you can vote someone to protect them from being ejected. You can only do this a configurable amount of times.
MayorInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Bürgermeister hast du mehrere Votes. Je nach Einstellungen können diese Votes erkennbar oder normal dargestellt werden Wenn du einen Vent benutzt berufst du ein Notfalltreffen ein.
Wenn du mit den Aufgaben fertig bist, sieht man deine Rolle.
ParanoiaInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Paranoid can call a meeting by venting. The report animation will show a dead body with Paranoid's color, but the Paranoid is not actually dead.
PsychicInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Psychic can see the names of several players highlighted in red during the meeting, at least one of them is evil. The Psychic will correctly see all Neutrals and Killing Crewmates displayed as red names when becoming a Madmate.
SabotageMasterInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Der Mechaniker kann immer die Vents nutzen. Er kann Reaktor, O2 und die Kommunikation auf einer Seite beheben und Lichter können mit einem Schalter behoben werden. Das Öffnen einer Türe öffnet alle Türen der Map.
SheriffInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Der Sheriff hat keine Aufgaben. Er kann die Verräter killen (je nach Hosteinstellungen auch die Neutralen). Wenn der Sheriff ein Besatzungsmitglied killen will, begeht er Selbstmord. Er kann jeden killen, wenn er Verräterhelfer wird (abhängig von den Hosteinstellungen).
VigilanteInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Vigilante is tasked with eliminating potential threats to the crew, but if they mistakenly kill an innocent crew member, they become a Madmate driven by guilt and remorse.

 Note: Gangster can not convert Vigilante into madmate.
JailerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Jailer, use your kill button to lock a player in jail. During the next meeting, the jailed player cannot vote or be voted (vote count will be 0). The Jailer may choose to execute the prisoner by voting them. If the Jailer executes an innocent player, the Jailer loses the ability to execute for the rest of the game.
If the Jailer is evil, then they can execute anyone.
The Jailer has limited executions.

Note : Jailed players cannot be guessed or judged and jailed players can only guess Jailer.
SnitchInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Wenn die Snitch ihre Aufgaben vollendet hat, sieht sie die Namen der Verräter im Treffen in rot. Wenn sie noch eine Aufgabe hat, sehen die Verräter ein 「★」bei sich selbst und bei der Snitch. Wenn die Snitch ein Verräterhelfer ist, ist der 「★」 rot.
MarshallInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Marshall, complete your tasks to reveal yourself to the rest of the crew.
Other teams will not be able to see you.
However, madmates CAN see you.
SpeedBoosterInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Der Beschleuniger erhöht seine Laufgeschwindigkeit je nach Aufgabenfortschritt. Hinweis: Wegen technischen Begrenzungen scheint der Beschleuniger für andere normal zu laufen bzw. dahinzuglitchen.
DoctorInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Der Doktor kann die Ursache der Kills von jedem Spieler sehen. Zusätzlich hat der Doktor batteriebegrenzten Zugriff auf die tragbare Lebensanzeige (wie der Wissenschaftler).
DictatorInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Wenn der Diktator jemanden votet, wird das Treffen beendet und der, den er gevotet hat, wird ausgeworfen. Der Diktator begeht, nachdem er wen gevotet hat, Selbstmord.
DetectiveInfoLong:
(Besatzungsmitglieder):
Nachdem der Detektiv eine Leiche meldet, bekommt er einen zusätzlichen Hinweis, welche Rolle die Leiche hatte. Nach den Einstellungen des Gastgebers, kann der Detektiv auch die Rolle des Mörders erfahren.
Notiz: Detektiv wird nicht Vergesslich.
UndercoverInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Impostors knows who Undercover is and sees him as a teammate, but Undercover himself does not know who the Impostors are.
NiceGuesserInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Der Gute Guesser kann die Rolle von bestimmten Spieler im Notfalltreffen guessen. Wenn der Guessversuch richtig war, stirbt der erratene, wenn er falsch war, stirbt der Böse Guesser.
Der Befehl zum Guessen ist: /bt [Spieler-ID] [Rolle]
Du kannst die Spieler-IDs neben jedem Namen der Spieler sehen, oder benutze den Befehl /id um dir alle Spieler-IDs anzeigen zu lassen.
GuessMasterInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Guess Master, you will receive information about every attempted guess made during a meeting. You will be informed about the role guesser tried to guess, and you will also be notified in case of a misguess.
SwordsManInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Knight has no tasks. They can kill any person but they can only do it once the whole game.
TransporterInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Whenever the Transporter completes the task, two random players will switch positions, but if there are not enough players left, nothing will happen. Note: Players in the vent will not be selected.
TimeManagerInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Je mehr Aufgaben der Zeitmanager erledigt, desto länger wird die Besprechungszeit. Wenn er stirbt, wird sie wieder zurückgesetzt. Wenn der Zeitmanager ein Verräterhelfer wird, wirkt sich die Fähigkeit genau verkehrt herum aus.
VeteranInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Veteran can enter the alert state by venting. If a player tries to kill the veteran in the alert state, the veteran will kill the murderer instead. Veteran will see a shield-animation on their body and a text displayed above their head as a reminder when they enter and exit the alert state.
BastionInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Bastion, bomb vents to kill off impostors and neutrals.
Be careful though, crewmates can also be killed with the bombs.
CopyCatInfoLong:
(Crewmate):
As the Copycat, you can use your kill button to copy target's role.

You can only copy some crewmate roles.
If you try to copy a madmate or rascal, you become the madmate variation of the target role.
If you target an evil that has a crewmate variant, you'll become the crewmate variant.

Additionally, Your role will be set back to copycat after every meeting
BodyguardInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
If a player is about to be killed near the Bodyguard, the Bodyguard will prevent the kill and die with the murderer. The Bodyguard's skills will affect players of any team. When the Bodyguard becomes a Madmate and the murderer is an Impostor, the Bodyguard will not activate the skill.
CounterfeiterInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Deceiver can sell the counterfeit to other players through the kill button. If the counterfeit is sold successfully, the Deceiver will see a shield animation on their body as a reminder. The counterfeit will take effect after the end of the next meeting. If the player with no kill ability holds the counterfeit, he will kill himself immediately. If the player with the kill ability has the counterfeit, he will suicide when he tries to kill someone next time.
GrenadierInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Grenadier, you can vent to Flashbang players nearby, causing them to lose vision if they are an Impostor or, depending on settings, a Neutral.
MedicInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Medic can place a shield on the target by pressing the Kill button. The Medic can only give one shield for the whole game, when the Medic dies, the target's shield will be removed. The Medic can also see if someone is trying to break the target's shield.
Depending on the host's settings, the Medic or the target can see if the player has a shield (shown as a green circle 「●」 next to the name).
DivinatorInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Fortune Teller, vote for a player in a meeting to get a clue to their role.
The clue will relate to their actual role.

When the Fortune Teller's tasks are complete, they will obtain the exact role rather than a clue!

Note:- If the setting to give random active players as hint is on, you will not be able to check same player multiple times
JudgeInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Judge can judge a certain player during the meeting. If the target is evil, the target will be killed (whether it is evil or not is set by the host), and if it is wrong, the judge commits suicide.
The judgment command is: /tl [player id]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
Judges can judge all players when they become Madmate.
MorticianInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Mortician can see arrows pointing to all dead bodies, and if the Mortician reports a body they will know the last player the victim had contact with. Note: Mortician won't be Oblivious or Seer.
MediumshiperInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Medium can establish contact with a dead player after their dead body is reported. The player who reports doesn't have to be the Medium. The dead player can answer once with a YES or a NO to the Medium's question which only the Medium will see (the dead player can use /ms yes or /ms no). Note: Medium won't be Oblivious.
ObserverInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Observer, you can see all shield animations caused by other players after the first meeting. This typically indicates the use of some role ability, so look out for this.
MonarchInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Monarch, you can knight players to give them an extra vote.

You cannot knight someone who already has extra votes.

Knighted players appear with a golden name.
If a knighted player is alive, the Monarch cannot be guessed or exhiled.
DovesOfNeaceInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
When the Pacifist vents, they will reset the kill cooldown for every player with a kill button. When they become a Madmate, this ability will only work on Crewmates.
FarseerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As a Overseer you have very limited vision but you can use your kill button to reveal the role of a nearby player. Use the kill button to start the reveal, a 「○」 will be displayed next to the reveal target. Stay near the target for a defined time to reveal his role, if you move too far away from the target the reveal will be aborted.
BloodhoundInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As a Coroner you can't report corpses, instead after trying to report the corpse you will see an arrow leading you to the killer. If a meeting is called, the arrows disappear. Depending on the setting, the body you found cannot be reported.
TrackerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As a Tracker, you can vote for a player in the meeting, which will mark their position for you in the game with arrows. In addition, at the beginning of a meeting you will be shown in which room the player was last, if the option is activated.
PresidentInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The President has 2 abilities: End the meeting and Reveal identity.

+ Ability 1: End the meeting - Type /finish in meetings as President to instantly end the meeting.
+ Ability 2: Reveal identity - Type /reveal in meetings to reveal yourself. Revealing yourself will make it so every player can see that you are the President and you will become unguessable after typing the command. However, after the President has revealed themselves, whoever killed the President will have their kill CD greatly reduced on their next kill.
MerchantInfoLong: (Crewmates):\As a merchant, you sell a random add-on to a random player for each task you complete. Each add-on sold earns you money. If you have a certain amount of money, you can avert the next killing attempt against you by bribing the murderer. The bribed player won't be able to kill you, but you don't know who it is. The bribe money used is lost and is not available for additional bribes.
RetributionistInfoLong:
(Crewmates [Ghost]):
As the Retributionist, you can kill a limited amount of players after your death.

Depending on the settings you may only do so while x amount players are alive and/or a set amount meetings have passed without a killer ejected.
DeputyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Deputy, use your kill button on a player to reset their kill cooldown.

If the target does not have a kill button, then the handcuff was a waste.
InvestigatorInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As an Investigator, you can use your kill button to investigate someone. When you investigate someone, their name will appear in either red if they possess a kill button (impostor/SS basis) or light blue if they lack a kill button (crewmate/engineer/scientist basis). However, please note that the color of the names will return to normal when a meeting is called.
GuardianInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Guardian, you become immortal upon tasks completion. You can't even be guessed in meetings.
AddictInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Addict, you have a suicide timer. When it expires you kill yourself.
The timer is indicated by the vent cooldown. When the vent cooldown is at 0 seconds, you still have a short time to vent.
If you don't make it you die, if you make it the suicide timer is reset.
Also, after you are ventilated, no one can interact with you for a defined period of time.
After this period is over, you are immobilized for another defined period of time and cannot report any bodies.
MoleInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Mole, when you vent, you stay in the vent for 1 second. When you come out of the vent, you will spawn near a random vent in the map (Except the one you just used).
AlchemistInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Alchemist, you brew potions when you complete tasks. The potion you made will show up under your role name with its corresponding description and instructions. You can get seven different potions, some with harmful or no effects. Vent to use the potion.
TracefinderInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Tracefinder, you can access vitals at any time.
In addition, you get arrows pointing to dead bodies, with a delay set by host.
OracleInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Oracle, you may vote a player during a meeting.
You'll see if they are a Crewmate, Neutral, or Impostor.
Depending on settings, there can be a chance that your result will be incorrect.
SpiritualistInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spiritualist, you get an arrow pointing towards the ghost of the last meeting's victim. There is an option for the arrow to disappear and reappear in intervals. Try to notify the ghost about your ability, if you can; if they are on your side, they may lead you to an evil role so you can eject them. Be careful, as evil roles can do the same for Crewmates.
ChameleonInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Chameleon, you can vent to temporarily Vanish. You will still appear visible on your screen. Vent again to become visible.
InspectorInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Check If two players are in the same team or not. You will get an affirmation message If they are in the same team, or a denial message if they are not in the same team.

All neutrals and converted playes are counted in the same team. Trickster is counted as crew and Rascal is counted as Impostor.
Checking command : /cmp [player id 1] [player id 2]
CaptainInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
With each completed task, the Captain gains the power to slow down a random non crew role. Crewmates can see ☆ besides captain's name.

If anyone betrays the captain's trust by voting captain out, they will lose an addon.
AdmirerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Admirer, admire a player to make them crewmate aligned.
They'll win with crewmates and not their original team.

You can only do this once per player.
TimeMasterInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Zeitmeister kannst du durchs Venten jedermanns Position markieren.
Wenn du ernuet ventest, setzt du jeden lebenden Spieler auf diese Position zurück.

Während der Fähigkeitsnutzung hast du ein Zeitschild welches dich vor dem Tod schützt.
CrusaderInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Crusader, use your kill button to crusade a player.
If that player gets attacked, you'll kill the attacker.
ReverieInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Reverie, you can kill but your cooldown starts high.

It increases if you kill a crewmate and reduces otherwise.
Depending on the host's setting you may misfire on reaching the max kill cooldown and your target dies with you. 

You win with other crewmates.
LookoutInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Lookout, you can see the IDs of every player at all times.
This allows you to see through shapeshifts and camouflages.
MonitorInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Telecommunication, you are notified when anyone uses cameras, vitals, doorlogs, or admin.
LighterInfoLong:
(Besatzung):
Als Leuchter kannst du venten, um deine Sicht temporär zu erhöhen.
Du hast erhöhte Sicht sowhl wenn Licht ein als auch aus ist.
Nutze diese Macht um raffinierte Killer zu beobachten!
TaskManagerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
You see the total number of tasks completed (by everyone all together) next to your role name, which updates in real time.
WitnessInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Witness, when you use your kill button on someone, you will know if they killed in the last X seconds or not. (X depends on the settings)
SwapperInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Swapper, you can swap votes in meetings.

To swap votes, use '/sw [playerID]' twice.

Player IDs are displayed next to player names in meetings, but you can also use /id to get a list of all player IDs.

Note: You cannot swap yourself
ChiefOfPoliceInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
Players with swords can be recruited to join the sheriff's team to serve the crew, but players without swords cannot be recruited.
 note: only one recruitment opportunity
NiceMiniInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As a Nice Mini, you can't be killed until you grow up, and if you die or are evicted from the meeting before you grow up, everyone loses.
SpyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spy, when someone uses their kill button on you (any ability that is used through the kill button), you'll see their name in orange for a few seconds.
Note: If a Crewmate used their ability on you, you'll also see them with an orange name!
Note: If you have no ability uses left, you won't see orange names at all!
Note: If the kill button interaction is blocked the player's cooldown will reset to 10s'
RandomizerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As this Randomizer, when you die, your killer will do one of the following:
  1. self-report your body
  2. stand next to your body
  3. have their kill cooldown set to 600s
  4. Randomly avenge a player
ArsonistInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Der Feuerteufel kann Spieler übergießen, indem er den Killknopf drückt und einige Sekunden bei dem Spieler bleibt. Wenn das Übergießen erfolgreich beginnt, wird dir eine Schildanimation gezeigt. Wenn der Feuerteufel alle Spieler übergossen hat, kannst du venten, um das Feuer zu entfachen und zu gewinnen.

Wenn neben dem Spielernamen ein 「△」 ist, wird er gerade übergossen.
Wenn neben dem Spielernamen ein 「▲」 ist, ist derjenige schon übergossen.
Je nach Einstellungen kann er das jederzeit beginnen. Wenn du es nicht bis zum Spielende schaffst, verlierst du.
EnigmaInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Enigma, you get a random clue about the killer each meeting, depending on the setting, you may have to report the body to receive a clue. The more tasks you complete the more precise the clues get.
PyromaniacInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pyromaniac, you can douse players (single click) or kill normally (double click). Dousing players does nothing immediately, but killing a doused player will significantly shorten your kill cooldown. To win, be the last player alive.
KamikazeInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Kamikaze you can single click to mark people. Double click to kill normally. When you die all marked also die, with death reason Targeted.
HuntsmanInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Huntsman, you have a certain amount of targets that reset every meeting. If you kill one of your targets, your kill cooldown decreases by the set amount permanately. If you kill someone else other than any of your targets, your kill cooldown permanately increases by the set amount. You see your targets with a colored name.
MiniInfoLong:
(Crewmate or Impostor):
The Mini is two roles. Either a Nice Mini or an Evil Mini is chosen.

Use '/r nicemini' and '/r evilmini' respectively for more details.
JesterInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Wenn der Narr rausgevotet wird, gewinnt er alleine. Wenn er das Spiel bis zum Ende überlebt, verliert er. Hinweis: Narr, Scharfrichter und Unschuldiger können gemeinsam gewinnen.
TerroristInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Wenn der Terrorist stirbt, nachdem er seine Aufgaben erledigt hat, gewinnt er das Spiel allein. (Er kann durchs Rausvoten oder durch einen Kill gewinnen).
ExecutionerInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Der Scharfrichter hat ein Ziel, dieser Spieler ist mit einem Diamantsymbol 「♦」 neben dessen Namen markiert. Wenn sein Ziel gekillt wird, wird der Scharfrichter je nach Einstellungen zum Besatzungsmitglied, Narr oder Opportunist. Wenn das Ziel in einem Treffen rausgevotet wird, gewinnt er.
Hinweis: Narr, Scharfrichter und Unschuldiger können gemeinsam gewinnen.
LawyerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
Lawyer has a target to defend, which will be indicated by a diamond 「♦」 next to their name.
If your target wins, you win.
If they lose, you lose.
OpportunistInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Wenn der Opportunist bis zum Ende des Spiels überlebt, gewinnt er mit den gewinnenden Spielern.
MarioInfoLong:
(Neutrale):
Vektor wird allein gewinnen, wenn er sich eine bestimmte Anzahl in Schächte begeben hat.
JackalInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Als Schakal gewinnst du als letzter Überlebender. Zusätzlich kannst du mit dem Killknopf andere rekrutieren. Wenn der getroffene Spieler nicht rekrutiert werden kann, passiert entweder nichts oder du killst ihn (also nicht öffentlich versuchen zu rekrutieren). Wenn der getroffene Spieler einen Killknopf hat und dessen Einstellung, rekrutiert zu werden aktiv ist, wird er zum Kumpan. Andernfalls bekommt er das Rekruten-Add-on, wenn dieses akiviert ist.
GodInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the God, you know everyone's role from the beginning. If you live until the end of the game, you snatch the win, i.e. everyone else loses and you win.
InnocentInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Der Unschuldige kann den Killknopf dazu benutzen, dass der markierte Spieler ihn killt. Wird der benutzte Spieler im Treffen gevotet, gewinnt der Unschuldige. Hinweis: Narr, Scharfrichter und Unschludiger können gemeinsam gewinnen.
PelicanInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pelican, you can use the kill button to swallow a player alive, teleporting them off-bounds but not killing them yet. Those who are swallowed will only die if you're still alive at the end of the round. If you die or leave during the round, all alive swallowed players will spawn into the map where you were.
RevolutionistInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Revolutionist, you can recruit players by clicking the kill button on the player and following them until the shield animation plays for you. Recruiting has a chance, set by host, to kill players (though they are still recruited). When the required number of players are recruited, (displayed next to your name) you must vent within the specified time in order to win the game immediately with all of your recruits. If you do not vent in time, you lose and die.
HaterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Hater, you have no kill cooldown. However, you can only kill Lovers, and other recruiting roles and add-ons, depending on the settings. Killing anyone else will make you suicide. You win at the end of the game with the winning team if none of the killable roles are alive. You will not be Lovers.
GamerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Demon, you kill by draining health. You see health in percentage near everyone's name, and every attack you make drains a percentage from that health without the victim knowing. Once you drain your victim's health to 0, they die. You win if you are the last one standing.
DarkHideInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Stalker can kill anyone, and every kill will immediately cause electricity sabotage (if electricity is already sabotaged, nothing will happen). Stalker cannot vent. If the Impostor wins while the Stalker is alive or the Crewmate wins by killing the Impostors (according to the host's setting, the Stalker may also win when the Crewmate wins by killing the Neutrals), then the Stalker win alone.
WorkaholicInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Workaholic, you win alone when you complete all tasks. Depending on host's settings, you can only win if alive and/or you are revealed to everyone at the beginning (these settings are almost never both on).
SolsticerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Solsticer, you won't die, and you win by finishing all your tasks in a single round. After every meeting is finished, your tasks get reset, and you need to start all over again.
Votes on the Solsticer will be directly cancelled.
Kill attempts on the Solsticer will teleport it out of the map like Pelican until the meeting is finished.
The killer's kill cooldown will be reset to 10 seconds.
CollectorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Collector, when you vote for a player, for each other player that voted for them, you gain a point. When you collect the required number of votes, the game ends and you win alone, even if you voted a Jester or Executioner's target out.
GlitchInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Glitch, you can hack players (single click) or kill normally (double click).
Those who have been hacked cannot kill, vent, or report for the hack duration.
Additionally, calling a sabotage other than doors will have no effect, and will instead disguise you as a random player. You cannot disguise during or after sabotages.
To win, be the last player alive.
SidekickInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Als Kumpan ist es deine Aufgabe dem Schakal beim Killen zu helfen.
ProvocateurInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Provocateur, you can kill any target with the kill button. If the target loses at the end of the game, the Provocateur wins with the winning team.
BloodKnightInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Blood Knight wins when they're the last killing role alive and the amount of crewmates is lower or equal to the amount of Blood Knights. The Blood Knight gains a temporary shield after every kill that makes them immortal for a few seconds.
PlagueBearerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Plaguebearer, plague everyone using your kill button to turn into Pestilence.
Once you turn into Pestilence you will become immortal and gain the ability to kill.
In addition to this, after turning into Pestilence you will kill anyone who tries to kill you.

To win, turn into Pestilence and kill everyone.
PestilenceInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As Pestilence, you're an unstoppable machine.
Any attack towards you will be reflected back towards them.
Indirect kills don't even kill you.

Only way to kill Pestilence is by vote, or by it misguessing.
TotocalcioInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Follower can use their Kill button on someone to start following them and can use the Kill button again to switch the following target. If the Follower's target wins, the Follower will win along with them. Note: The Follower can also win after they die.
SuccubusInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Cultist, your kill button is used to Charm others, making them win with you. To win, charm all who pose a threat and gain majority.
Depending on settings, you may be able to charm Neutrals, and those you Charm may count as their original team, nothing, or a Cultist to determine when you win due to majority.
SerialKillerInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Als Serienkiller gewinnst du als letzter Überlebender. Je nach Einstellungen bist du kann dir nichts angetan werden und kannst keinen Teamkollegen haben.
JuggernautInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Juggernaut, your kill cooldown decreases with each kill you make.

Kill everyone to win.
InfectiousInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Infectious, your job is to infect as many players as you can.

If you infect all the killers, you then can simply outnumber the crew and win the game.

If you die, all the players you've infected will die after the next meeting.
If they achieve your win condition before then, you can still win.
VirusInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The task of the virus is to kill or infect all other players. When the virus murders a crewmate, their corpse is infected with a virus. The crewmate who reports this corpse is infected and joins the virus team or dies at the end of the meeting if the virus won't get voted out, dependent on the settings. If there are more players on the Virus team than on the Crewmate team, the Virus team wins.
PursuerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pursuer, you can use your ability on someone to make them misfire when they try to kill.

To win, just survive to the end of the game.
PhantomInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Als Gespenst ist es dein Ziel, zu sterben und die Aufgaben erledigt zu haben.
Während du lebst kannst du normal Aufgaben machen, aber du kannst nicht lebendig gewinnen.
Wenn du gekillt wurdest und deine Aufgaben erledigt hast, gewinnst du mit dem Gewinnerteam.
PirateInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pirate, use your kill button to select a target every round.
You will duel with your target in the next meeting. 
If both Pirate and the target chooses same number, Pirate wins.
Additionally, if Pirate wins the duel or the target doesn't participate in the duel, the Pirate kills the target.

Dueling command:- /duel X (where X can be 0, 1 or 2)

You win after winning a certain number of duels set by the host.

Note: If target did not participate in duel, the kill will not count towards pirate victory
AgitaterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Agitator, your premise is essentially Hot Potato.

Use your kill button on a player to pass the bomb.
This can only be done once per round.

The player who receives the bomb will be notified when receiving said bomb, in which they need to pass it to another player by getting near a player.

When a meeting is called, the player with the bomb dies.

If trying to pass to Pestilence or a Veteran on alert, the bombed player dies instead.
Optionally, the Agitator cannot receive the bomb.
MaverickInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Maverick, you can kill and, depending on options, vent and have impostor vision
If you survive until the end of the game, you win with the winning team.
Use your killing ability to eliminate threats to your life, but don't get voted out.
CursedSoulInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Cursed Soul, you snatch the victory if you survive to the end of the game.

You can snatch the win from a Jester or Executioner.

Additionally, you can snatch the souls of other players.
Soulless players win with you and count as dead.
PickpocketInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pickpocket, you steal votes from your kills.
These votes are hidden.

Kill everyone to win.
TraitorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Traitor, you were an Impostor that betrayed the Impostors.
You know the Impostors but they don't know you.
The twist? They can kill you but you can't kill them.

Eliminate the Impostors by other means, then kill everyone else to win!
VultureInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Vulture, report bodies to win!

When you report a body, if your eat cooldown is up, you'll eat the body (makes it unreportable).
If your eat ability is still on cooldown, then you'll report the body normally.

Additionally, you'll report bodies normally if the maximum bodies eaten per round is reached.
TaskinatorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Taskinator, whenever you complete a task, the task will be bombed. When another player completes the bombed task, the bomb will detonate and the player will die.

You win if you survive till the end and Crew doesn't win.

 Note: Taskinator bombs ignore all protection.
BenefactorInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Benefactor, whenever you complete a task, the task will be marked. When another player completes the marked task, they get a temporary shield.

 Note: Shield only protects from direct kill attacks
MedusaInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Medusa, you can stone bodies much like cleaning a body.
Stoned bodies cannot be reported.

Kill everyone to win.
BakerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Baker, you give out bread.
At the beginning of each meeting, messages will be given out.

If you finish your tasks, you become Famine when a meeting is called.
FamineInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Famine, you give out poisoned bread.
Players with poisoned bread die at the end of the meeting if the Famine is not exiled.

If the Famine is alive at the end of the game, they steal the win.
SpiritcallerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Spiritcaller, your victims become Evil Spirits after they die. These spirits can help you win by freezing other players for a short time and/or blocking their vision. Alternatively, the spirits can give you a shield that protects you briefly from an attempted kill.
AmnesiacInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Amnesiac, use your report button to remember a role. If the target was an Impostor, you'll become a Refugee. If the target was a crewmate, you'll become the target role if compatible (otherwise you become an Engineer). If the target was a passive neutral or a neutral killer not specified, you'll become the role defined in the settings. If the target was a neutral killer of a select few, you'll become the role they are.
ImitatorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Imitator, use your kill button to imitate a player.

You'll either become a Sheriff, a Refugee or some Neutral
BanditInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Bandit, you can click your kill button once to steal a player's addon and twice to kill. Depending on the settings, you may instantly steal the addon or after the meeting starts. After the max number of steals are reached you will kill normally. Additionally, if there are no stealable addons present on the target or the target is stubborn you will kill the target.

Kill everyone to win.

Note:- Cleansed, Last Impostor and Lovers can not be stolen.
Note:- If Bandit can vent is on, Nimble will become unstealable
DoppelgangerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Doppelganger, use your kill button to steal a player's identity (their name and skin) and then kill your target.

Kill everyone to win.

Note:- You can not steal the identity of the target when Camouflage is active.
MasochistInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Masochist, your goal is to get attacked a few times to win.

You cannot be guessed, as that adds to your attack count.
DoomsayerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Doomsayer can guess the role of a certain player during the meeting.
If the Doomsayer guesses a certain number of roles (the number depends on the host settings) then he wins.
The guessing command is: /bt [player id] [role]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
ShroudInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Shroud, you do not kill normally.
Instead, use your kill button to shroud a player.
Shrouded players kill others.
If the shrouded player doesn't make a kill, they'll kill themself after a meeting.

Shroud sees shrouded players with a 「◈」mark next to their name.
Shrouded players who did not make a kill will also have the 「◈」mark in meetings, where they'll die if the Shroud is alive by the end of the meeting.
WerewolfInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Werewolf, you can kill much like any killer.
However, when you kill, any nearby players also die.
Any player who dies to this will have their death reason as Mauled.

To balance this, you have a higher kill cooldown than anyone else.
ShamanInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Shaman, you can use your kill button to select a voodoo doll once per round. If the kill button is used on you, the effect will be deflected omto the voodoo doll.
If you survive until the end, you win with the winning team.
SeekerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the seeker, use your kill button to tag the target. If seeker tags wrong player a point is deducted and if seeker tags correct player a point will be added.
Additionally, the seeker will not be able to move for 5 seconds after every meeting and after getting a new target

 The seeker needs to collect certain number of points set by the host to win
PixieInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pixie, Mark upto x amount of targets each round by using kill button on them. When the meeting starts, your job is to have one of the marked targets ejected. If unsuccessful you will suicide, except if you didn't mark any targets or all the targets are dead. The selected targets resets to 0 after the meeting ends. If you succeed you will gain a point. You see all your targets in colored names.

You win with the winning team when you have certain amounts of points set by the host.
SoulCollectorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As a Soul Collector, you vote players to predict their death. If the prediction is correct and the target dies in the next round you collect their soul. 

You win by collecting configurable number of souls set by the host
SchrodingersCatInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As Schrodingers Cat, if someone attempts to use the kill button on you, you will block the action and join their team. This blocking ability works only once. By default, you don't have a victory condition, meaning you win only after switching teams.
In Addition to this, you will be counted as nothing in the game.

Note: If the killing machine attempts to use their kill button on you, the interaction is not blocked, and you will die.
RomanticInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Romantic can pick their lover partner using their kill button (this can be done at any point of the game). Once they've picked their partner, they can use their kill button to give their partner a temporary shield which protects them from attacks. If their lover partner dies, the Romantic's role will change according to the following conditions:
1. If their partner was an Impostor, the Romantic becomes the Refugee
2. If their partner was a Neutral Killer, then they become Ruthless Romantic.
3. If their partner was a Crewmate or a non-killing neutral, the Romantic becomes the Vengeful Romantic. 

The Romantic wins with the winning team if their partner wins.
Note : If your role changes your win condition will be changed accordingly
RuthlessRomanticInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
You change your roles from Romantic if your partner (A neutral killer) is killed. As Ruthless Romantic, you win if you kill everyone and be the last one standing. If you win your dead partner also wins with you.
VengefulRomanticInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
You change your roles from Romantic if your partner (A crew or non neutral killer) is killed. As a Vengeful Romantic, Your goal is to avenge your partner, which means you have to kill the killer of your partner. If you succeed to do so, then both you and your partner win with the winning team at the end. If you try to kill someone other than your partner's killer, then you will die by misfire.
PoisonerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Poisoner, your kills are delayed.
Kill everyone to win.
HexMasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Hex Master, you can hex players or kill them.
Hexing a player works the same as spelling as a Witch.
WraithInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Wraith, you can vent to temporarily Vanish. You will still appear visible on your screen. Vent again to become visible. You win if you are the last player remaining.
JinxInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Jinx, whenever you are attacked, you jinx them, resulting in them dying to a jinx.
This has limited uses.

Kill off everyone to win.
PotionMasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Potion Master, you have three potions assigned to three different actions.

Single click: Reveal role
Double click: Kill
Map: Sabotage

The reveal potion has a limit.
When you run out, the kill buttons defaults to killing.
NecromancerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Necromancer, you win when you're the last one standing.
Additionally, when someone tries to kill you, the kill will be blocked and you will be teleported to a random vent. You will have a limited time to kill your killer. If you succeed to do so, you live. If the time runs out before you kill your killer, you die permanately. If you try to kill someone else other than your killer, you will die.
LastImpostorInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Dieser Effekt ist dem letzten lebenden Verräter vorbehalten. Er reduziert die Killwartezeit.
OverclockedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Overclocked, your kill cooldown is reduced by a percentage.

Only assigned to roles with a kill button.
LoversInfoLong:
(Add-ons),
Die Liebhaber sind eine Kombination von zwei Spielern. Sie gewinnen, wenn sie alleine übrig bleiben. Wenn einer gewinnt, gewinnt der andere Liebhaber mit. Die Liebhaber sehen neben ihren Namen eine 「♥」 Markierung. Wenn einer von ihnen stirbt, stirbt der andere aus Liebesselbstmord mit (je nach Hosteinstellungen aber auch nicht). Wenn einer von ihnen rausgevotet wird, stirbt der andere und hinterlässt eine nicht meldbare Leiche.
MadmateInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Only Crewmate can become Madmate. Madmate's task is to help the Impostors win the game, Madmate will lose if all Impostors are killed/ejected. Madmates may know who are Impostors and Impostors may know who are Madmates (host settings).

Lazy Guy, Celebrity can't become Madmate. Sheriff, Snitch, Nice Guesser, Mayor, and Judge may become Madmate (host settings). Skill changes when the following roles are converted into Madmates:

Time Manager => Doing tasks will reduce meeting time.
Bodyguard => Skill won't activate if the killer is an Impostor.
Grenadier => Flash bomb will work on Crewmates and Neutrals instead of the Impostors.
Sheriff => Can kill anyone including Impostors (host settings).
Nice Guesser => Can guess Crewmates and Neutrals
Psychic => All evil Neutrals and Crewmates' names with the ability to kill will be displayed in Red.
Judge => Can judge anyone.
NtrInfoLong:
(Erweiterungen):
Wenn ein Neptun anwesend ist, werden alle Spieler Partner mit Neptun sein, und sie werden nicht in Liebe zusammen sterben, und werden nicht Gewinnbedingungen ändern.
Notiz: Liebende werden nicht Neptun, und Neptun wird nicht Liebende.
WatcherInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Während dem Treffen, sieht der Beobachter jedes Vote.
FlashInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The Flash's default movement speed is faster than others. (speed depends on the setting of the host)
TorchInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Torch has max vision and is not affected by Lights sabotage.
SeerInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Wenn ein Spieler gekillt wird sieht der Seher einen Killblitz (meist ein roter Blitz, wie bei einer Alarmsabotage).
TiebreakerInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Wenn ein unentschiedenes Vote herauskommt, wird der Spieler ausgeworfen, auf den der Tiebrecher gevotet hat. Hinweis: Haben 2 Tiebrecher entgegengesetzt gevotet wirkt diese Fähigkeit nicht.
ObliviousInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Detective and Cleaners won't be Oblivious. Oblivious cannot report dead bodies. Note: Bait killed by Oblivious will still be reported automatically, and Oblivious can still be used as a scapegoat for the Anonymous.
BewilderInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Bewilder may have a smaller/bigger vision. When the Bewilder is killed, the murderer's vision may become the same as the Bewilder's vision depending on the settings.
WorkhorseInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The first player to complete all the tasks will become Workhorse, Workhorse will give the player extra tasks. The amount of additional tasks are set by the host.
FoolInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Sleuth and Mechanic won't be Fool. Fools can't repair any sabotage.
AvangerInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Host can set whether the Impostor can become an Avenger. When the Avenger is killed (voted out and unconventional kills are not counted), the Avenger will revenge a random player.
YoutuberInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Only Crewmate will become YouTuber. When the YouTuber is the first player to be killed in the game, the YouTuber will win alone. If the YouTuber does not meet the win conditions, the YouTuber will follow the Crewmate to win. Note: Indirect killing methods such as being exiled, being guessed by the Guesser, etc. will not trigger the skills of the YouTuber.
EgoistInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Verräterhelfer und Neutrale können nicht Egoist werden. Wenn das Egoistenteam gewinnt, gewinnt er anstatt seinem ursprünglichen Team.
TicketsStealerInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Every time a Stealer kills a person, he gets an additional vote (the vote number is set by the host, and the decimal is rounded down). Also, extra votes from the Stealer are hidden during meeting.
SchizophrenicInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Not assigned to Neutrals nor Madmates.
As the Schizophrenic, you will be considered as two players in the game for the purpose of determining when the game ends due to killers having majority. Additionally, this grants you an extra vote, depending on options.
MimicInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Only Impostor can become Mimic. When the Mimic is dead, other Impostors will receive a message once a meeting is called, this message will include information on roles who were killed by the Mimic.
GuesserInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Als Guesser kannst du die Rolle von bestimmten Spieler im Notfalltreffen guessen um sie zu killen. Wenn der Guessversuch falsch war, stirbt du sofort.
Der Befehl zum Guessen ist: /bt [Spieler-ID] [Rolle]
Du kannst die Spieler-IDs neben jedem Namen der Spieler sehen, oder benutze den Befehl /id um dir alle Spieler-IDs anzeigen zu lassen.
NecroviewInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The Necroview can see the teams of dead players. The following info will be displayed on the dead player's name while in a meeting:
- The Red name indicates the Impostors.
- The Cyan name indicates the Crewmates.
- The Gray name indicates the Neutrals.
ReachInfoLong:
(Add-on)
Only roles with a kill button can get this add-on. You have the longest kill range possible in the game, unlike everyone else.
BaitInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When the Bait is killed, the murderer who killed the Bait will be forced to self-report the Bait's body. However, this won't happen when the Bait is killed by a Scavenger, Cleaner, Swooper, Wraith, or Killing Machine. The report may have a delay according to Host's settings.
TrapperInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Wenn die Bärenfalle gekillt wird, zwingt sie ihren Killer für kurze Zeit auf der Leiche zu bleiben.
CharmedInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
The Charmed add-on is obtained by being charmed by the Cultist.
Once charmed, you are now on the Cultist's team and no longer on your original team.
CleansedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Cleansed Add-on can only be obtained if cleanser erases all your Add-ons. Depending on the cleanser settings, you may not be able to obtain any more Add-ons in the future.
InfectedInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
The Infected add-on is obtained by being infected by the Infectious.
Once infected, you work for the Infectious and do not win with your original team.
OnboundInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Onbound add-on, you cannot be guessed in meetings.
ReboundInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Rebound add-on, if a Guesser successfully guessed you or a Judge successfully judged you, they will die instead.
If a player with Double Shot guesses you correctly, they will die instantly.
MundaneInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Mundane, you can only guess after all your tasks has been finished.
KnightedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When a Monarch knights someone, they get an extra vote.
UnreportableInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Disregarded add-on, your corpse cannot be reported.
ContagiousInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
When the Virus infects you, you become contagious.
Contagious players are on the Virus team.

Whether or not you die after a meeting depends on the settings for the Virus.
RogueInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
As the Rogue, you work against your team and work with other Rogues.

You cannot win with your original team.
LuckyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Lucky add-on there is a probability for you to evade the kill, the specific probability is set by the host. When the evasion takes effect, the killer will see the shield-animation, but you not know anything.
DoubleShotInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When a player with Double Shot guesses a role incorrectly, they will get a second chance to guess, but the next wrong guess will result in suicide.
RascalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Rascal, you can die to the Sheriff and Snitch can find you if Snitch can find madmates.

Only assigned to Crewmates, cannot be assigned by the Merchant.
SoullessInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When a Cursed Soul snatches your soul, you get this add-on.

You are not counted as alive.
GravestoneInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Gravestone, your role is revealed to everyone when you die.
LazyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Lazy, you are assigned a single short task and are immune to Warlocks, Puppeteers, and Gangsters.
AutopsyInfoLong:
(Erweiterungen):
Als der Autopsie kannst du sehen, wie Spieler gestorben sind.

Kann nicht an Doktor, Pfadfinder, Wissenschaftler oder Sonnyboy vergeben werden.
LoyalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Loyal, you cannot be recruited by roles such as Jackal or Cultist.

Cannot be assigned to neutrals.
EvilSpiritInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Evil Spirit, it's your job to help the Spiritcaller to victory. You can use your Haunt button to freeze players and reduce their vision. Alternatively, you can use your Haunt button to temporarily give the Spiritcaller a shield against a kill attempt.
RecruitInfoLong:
(Wirksame Add-ons):
Als Kumpanrekrut gehörst du dem Schakalteam an und hilfst dem Schakal und seinen Kumpanen.
AdmiredInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
As an admired player, you win with the crew and not your original team.

You can see the Admirer.
GlowInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Glow, your name is colored during a lights sabotage.
DiseasedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When someone tries to use kill button on you, their cooldown will be increased by configurable amount of time
AntidoteInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
