When someone tries to use kill button on you, their cooldown will be decreased by configurable amount of time
StubbornInfoLong:
(Erweiterungen):
Mit der 'Hartnäckig' Erweiterung kann der Auslöscher nicht deine Rolle auslöschen, die Reinigungskraft kann nicht deine Erweiterungen entfernen, der Bandit kann dich nicht bestehlen, und der Monarch kann dich nicht zum Ritter schlagen. Zusätzlich kannst du keine neuen Erweiterungen vom Handelsmann erhalten
SwiftInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Swift, you will not make any movement when you kill.
UnluckyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Unlucky, doing tasks, killing, or venting as a chance to kill you.
VoidBallotInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Holder of this addon will have 0 vote count
AwareInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Aware, you will be notified in the next meeting if a revealing role had interacted with you
FragileInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Fragile, you will die instantly if someone tries to use kill button on you (even if the role can not directly kill)
GhoulInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Ghoul, one of two outcomes can occur on tasks completion.

If alive: Suicide
If dead: You kill your killer if they're alive.

Only assigned to crewmates, and not crewmates with no tasks or are task based.
BloodlustInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Bloodlust, doing tasks allows you to kill.
When you complete a task, the next player you come in contact with dies.

Your bloodlust remains after a meeting.
Upon making a kill, your bloodlust clears till the next task you complete.
Bloodlusts do not stack.

Only assigned to crewmates with tasks.
SunglassesInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Sunglasses, your vision is reduced.
MareInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Mare, you have a low kill cooldown and have higher speed but can only kill during lights.

Additionally, your name will appear in red during lights.

Only assigned to Impostors and cannot be guessed.
BurstInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Burst, your killer explodes if they aren't inside a vent after a set amount of time.
SleuthInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Sleuth, you gain info from dead bodies.

Optionally, you may also gain the killer's role.

Not assigned to Detective or Mortician.
ClumsyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Clumsy, you have a chance to miss your kill.

When you miss, your cooldown is reset and the target remains untouched.

Only assigned to killers.
CircumventInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Circumvent, you can't vent.

Only assigned to Impostors.
NimbleInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Nimble, you gain access to the vent button.

Only assigned to certain crewmates.
InfluencedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Influenced, your vote will be forced to the player with the most votes.
Influenced vote won't be counted while choosing the exiled player'
Note that your vote skill still functions on the player you voted first
If all the alive players are Influenced,then the vote result won't shift
Collector cannot become influenced.
SilentInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Silent, your vote icon won't appear on the result screen.
So nobody knows who you voted for.
SusceptibleInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Susceptible, your death reason will be random.
TrickyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Tricky, your kills will have a random death reason.
TiredInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Whenever Tired kills (or uses kill ability on) someone, alternatively whenever they complete a task, they will temporarily get lower vision & lower speed.
StatueInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Whenever many people are near Statue, the Statue is completely frozen or slowed down dependand on settings.
CyberInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Cyber, you cannot be killed while in a group.
Additionally, your death will be known.
HurriedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the hurried, you must finish all your tasks to win with your team! If you failed with your tasks, you lose.
Hurried hurries to his goal so it won't get madmate,charmed or so.
OiiaiInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Wenn du als Oiiai gekillt wirst, verliert dein Killer seine Rolle.
Je nach Einstellungen bekommt er dann die Oiiai-Rolle oder nicht.
RainbowInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the rainbow, you change your colors like crazy
GMInfoLong:
(None):
The Game Master is an observer role.
Their presence has no effect on the game, and all players know who the Game Master is. The Game Master role will be assigned to the host, who will automatically become a ghost at the start of the game.
SunnyboyInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Sunnyboy, you win if you are dead by the end of the game. When you are alive, the game will not end due to killers gaining majority.
Additionally, you have access to portable vitals.
BardInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When a bard is alive, the exile confirmation will display a sentence composed by the bard. Whenever the bard completes a creation, the bard's kill cooldown is permanently halved.
NukerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Nuker, you're a stronger Bomber.

Shapeshift to nuke everyone.
WardenInfoLong:
(Crewmates [Ghost]):
As the Warden, alert someone of nearby danger, additionally giving them a temporary speed boost.
MinionInfoLong:
(Impostor [Ghost]):
As the Minion, you can temporarily blind non-impostors.

QuizmasterInfo: Quiz people to kill them in meetings
QuizmasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Quizmaster, you can mark a player using your kill button. In the next meeting, the marked player will "?!" next to their name. If the player answers a question wrongly, or doesn't answer, they will die. If the Quizmaster was killed/ejected in the same meeting, the player will live.
The Quizmaster cannot mark multiple people in the same round
QuizmasterChat.MarkedPublic: {QMTARGET} has been marked by the Quizmaster To survive {QMTARGET} have to answer correct to their question!
QuizmasterChat.Answers: Answers A: {QMA} B: {QMB} C: {QMC} To answer just type /answer [answer letter] If you need to recheck the answer and questions just do /qmquiz
QuizmasterChat.Correct: {QMTARGET} got the right answer! You can now mark someone else!
QuizmasterChat.CorrectPublic: {QMTARGET} got the Quizmaster's question answer correct and survived! Beware of the Quizmaster!
QuizmasterChat.WrongTarget: Wrong Your answer was {QMWRONG} The correct answer was {QMRIGHT} The Quizmaster was {QM}
QuizmasterChat.Wrong: {QMTARGET} got the wrong answer and died! You can now mark someone else!
QuizmasterChat.WrongPublic: {QMTARGET} got the Quizmaster's question answer wrong and died! Beware of the Quizmaster!
QuizmasterChat.Marked: You've marked {QMTARGET} If {QMTARGET} doesn't answer by the end of the meeting or answer wrong {QMTARGET} will die
QuizmasterChat.Title: Quizmaster Information
QuizmasterChat.CantAnswer: As the quizmaster you can't answer questions
QuizmasterChat.AnswerNotValid: Your answer must be A, B or C
